attributes.action: Sack MPs that vote against Brexit, as this is a vote against  democracy.
attributes.background: The majority of people voted to leave the EU, so a vote against Brexit is a vote against a democratic decision made by the people of the uk. The same people that put MPs into power. This would be a vote against the people so therefore they should be sacked, as they are no longer for the people.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
